title: African Burial Ground National Monument: Current Conditions
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Current Conditions             Alerts & Conditions         Alerts    Caution        Security Screening  Alert 1 , Severity ,caution ,, Security Screening  Please be advised that visitors entering 290 Broadway are subject to airport-style security. This may include the removal of shoes and presenting of photo identification. Please plan accordingly.     Information        Memorial Fountains  Alert 1 , Severity ,information ,, Memorial Fountains  The fountains of African Burial Ground National Monument's outdoor memorial will be closed for preventative maintenance June 22-29, 2016. We apologize for any inconvenience caused.
